00018     // Match a line comment (/.*?(?=\n|\r\n?|\Z)/.
00019     const char* line_comment(const char* src)
00020     {
00021       return sequence<
00022                exactly <
00023                  slash_slash
00024                >,
00025                non_greedy<
00026                  any_char,
00027                  end_of_line
00028                >
00029              >(src);
00030     }
00031 
00032     // Match a block comment.
00033     const char* block_comment(const char* src)
00034     {
00035       return sequence<
00036                zero_plus < space >,
00037                delimited_by<
00038                  slash_star,
00039                  star_slash,
00040                  false
00041                >
00042              >(src);
00043     }
00044     /* not use anymore - remove?
00045     const char* block_comment_prefix(const char* src) {
00046       return exactly<slash_star>(src);
00047     }
00048     // Match either comment.
00049     const char* comment(const char* src) {
00050       return line_comment(src);
00051     }
00052     */
00053 
00054     // Match zero plus white-space or line_comments
00055     const char* optional_css_whitespace(const char* src) {
00056       return zero_plus< alternatives<spaces, line_comment> >(src);
00057     }
00058     const char* css_whitespace(const char* src) {
00059       return one_plus< alternatives<spaces, line_comment> >(src);
00060     }
00061     // Match optional_css_whitepace plus block_comments
00062     const char* optional_css_comments(const char* src) {
00063       return zero_plus< alternatives<spaces, line_comment, block_comment> >(src);
00064     }
00065     const char* css_comments(const char* src) {
00066       return one_plus< alternatives<spaces, line_comment, block_comment> >(src);
00067     }
00068 
00069     // Match one backslash escaped char /\\./
00070     const char* escape_seq(const char* src)
00071     {
00072       return sequence<
00073         exactly<'\\'>,
00074         any_char
00075       >(src);
00076     }
00077 
00078     // Match identifier start
00079     const char* identifier_alpha(const char* src)
00080     {
00081       return alternatives<
00082                alpha,
00083                unicode,
00084                exactly<'-'>,
00085                exactly<'_'>,
00086                escape_seq
00087              >(src);
00088     }
00089 
00090     // Match identifier after start
00091     const char* identifier_alnum(const char* src)
00092     {
00093       return alternatives<
00094                alnum,
00095                unicode,
00096                exactly<'-'>,
00097                exactly<'_'>,
00098                escape_seq
00099              >(src);
00100     }
00101 
00102     // Match CSS identifiers.
00103     const char* identifier(const char* src)
00104     {
00105       return sequence<
00106                zero_plus< exactly<'-'> >,
00107                one_plus < identifier_alpha >,
00108                zero_plus < identifier_alnum >
00109                // word_boundary not needed
00110              >(src);
00111     }
00112 
00113     const char* identifier_alnums(const char* src)
00114     {
00115       return one_plus< identifier_alnum >(src);
00116     }
00117 
00118     // Match number prefix ([\+\-]+)
00119     const char* number_prefix(const char* src) {
00120       return alternatives <
00121         exactly < '+' >,
00122         sequence <
00123           exactly < '-' >,
00124           optional_css_whitespace,
00125           exactly< '-' >
00126         >
00127       >(src);
00128     }
00129 
00130     // Match interpolant schemas
00131     const char* identifier_schema(const char* src) {
00132       // follows this pattern: (x*ix*)+ ... well, not quite
00133       return sequence< one_plus< sequence< zero_plus< alternatives< identifier, exactly<'-'> > >,
00134                                  interpolant,
00135                                  zero_plus< alternatives< identifier, number, exactly<'-'> > > > >,
00136                        negate< exactly<'%'> > >(src);
00137     }
00138 
00139     // interpolants can be recursive/nested
00140     const char* interpolant(const char* src) {
00141       return recursive_scopes< exactly<hash_lbrace>, exactly<rbrace> >(src);
00142     }
00143 
00144     // $re_squote = /'(?:$re_itplnt|\\.|[^'])*'/
00145     const char* single_quoted_string(const char* src) {
00146       // match a single quoted string, while skipping interpolants
00147       return sequence <
00148         exactly <'\''>,
00149         zero_plus <
00150           alternatives <
00151             // skip escapes
00152             sequence <
00153               exactly < '\\' >,
00154               exactly < '\r' >,
00155               exactly < '\n' >
00156             >,
00157             escape_seq,
00158             // skip interpolants
00159             interpolant,
00160             // skip non delimiters
00161             any_char_but < '\'' >
00162           >
00163         >,
00164         exactly <'\''>
00165       >(src);
00166     }
00167 
00168     // $re_dquote = /"(?:$re_itp|\\.|[^"])*"/
00169     const char* double_quoted_string(const char* src) {
00170       // match a single quoted string, while skipping interpolants
00171       return sequence <
00172         exactly <'"'>,
00173         zero_plus <
00174           alternatives <
00175             // skip escapes
00176             sequence <
00177               exactly < '\\' >,
00178               exactly < '\r' >,
00179               exactly < '\n' >
00180             >,
00181             escape_seq,
00182             // skip interpolants
00183             interpolant,
00184             // skip non delimiters
00185             any_char_but < '"' >
00186           >
00187         >,
00188         exactly <'"'>
00189       >(src);
00190     }
00191 
00192     // $re_quoted = /(?:$re_squote|$re_dquote)/
00193     const char* quoted_string(const char* src) {
00194       // match a quoted string, while skipping interpolants
00195       return alternatives<
00196         single_quoted_string,
00197         double_quoted_string
00198       >(src);
00199     }
00200 
00201     const char* value_schema(const char* src) {
00202       // follows this pattern: ([xyz]*i[xyz]*)+
00203       return one_plus< sequence< zero_plus< alternatives< identifier, percentage, dimension, hex, number, quoted_string > >,
00204                                  interpolant,
00205                                  zero_plus< alternatives< identifier, percentage, dimension, hex, number, quoted_string, exactly<'%'> > > > >(src);
00206     }

00341     // Match CSS type selectors
00342     const char* namespace_prefix(const char* src) {
00343       return sequence< optional< alternatives< identifier, exactly<'*'> > >,
00344                        exactly<'|'> >(src);
00345     }
00346     const char* type_selector(const char* src) {
00347       return sequence< optional<namespace_prefix>, identifier>(src);
00348     }

00350       return sequence< zero_plus< exactly< '-' > >, identifier >(src);
00351     }

00353       return sequence< zero_plus< exactly< '-' > >, name >(src);

00356       return sequence< optional<namespace_prefix>, exactly<'*'> >(src);

00359     const char* id_name(const char* src) {
00360       return sequence<exactly<'#'>, name>(src);

00363     const char* class_name(const char* src) {

00367     const char* attribute_name(const char* src) {

00369                            identifier >(src);

00378       return class_char<sign_chars>(src);

00380     const char* unsigned_number(const char* src) {
00381       return alternatives<sequence< zero_plus<digits>,
00382                                     exactly<'.'>,
00383                                     one_plus<digits> >,
00384                           digits>(src);
00385     }

00387       return sequence< optional<sign>, unsigned_number>(src);

00390       return alternatives< sequence< optional<sign>, digits >,
00391                            sign >(src);

00395                        optional<digits>,

00398                        sign,
00399                        zero_plus < space >,
00400                        digits >(src);

00410     const char* em(const char* src) {

00412     } */
00413     const char* dimension(const char* src) {

00415     }
00416     const char* hex(const char* src) {
00417       const char* p = sequence< exactly<'#'>, one_plus<xdigit> >(src);
00418       ptrdiff_t len = p - src;
00419       return (len != 4 && len != 7) ? 0 : p;
00420     }
00421     const char* hexa(const char* src) {
00422       const char* p = sequence< exactly<'#'>, one_plus<xdigit> >(src);
00423       ptrdiff_t len = p - src;
00424       return (len != 4 && len != 7 && len != 9) ? 0 : p;
00425     }
00426     const char* hex0(const char* src) {
00427       const char* p = sequence< exactly<'0'>, exactly<'x'>, one_plus<xdigit> >(src);
00428       ptrdiff_t len = p - src;
00429       return (len != 5 && len != 8) ? 0 : p;
00430     }

00586     // match specific IE syntax
00587     const char* ie_progid(const char* src) {
00588       return sequence <
00589         word<progid_kwd>,
00590         exactly<':'>,
00591         alternatives< identifier_schema, identifier >,
00592         zero_plus< sequence<
00593           exactly<'.'>,
00594           alternatives< identifier_schema, identifier >
00595         > >,
00596         zero_plus < sequence<
00597           exactly<'('>,
00598           optional_css_whitespace,
00599           optional < sequence<
00600             alternatives< variable, identifier_schema, identifier >,
00601             optional_css_whitespace,
00602             exactly<'='>,
00603             optional_css_whitespace,
00604             alternatives< variable, identifier_schema, identifier, quoted_string, number, hexa >,
00605             zero_plus< sequence<
00606               optional_css_whitespace,
00607               exactly<','>,
00608               optional_css_whitespace,
00609               sequence<
00610                 alternatives< variable, identifier_schema, identifier >,
00611                 optional_css_whitespace,
00612                 exactly<'='>,
00613                 optional_css_whitespace,
00614                 alternatives< variable, identifier_schema, identifier, quoted_string, number, hexa >
00615               >
00616             > >
00617           > >,
00618           optional_css_whitespace,
00619           exactly<')'>
00620         > >
00621       >(src);
00622     }

00661       return sequence <
00662         ie_keyword_arg_property,
00663         optional_css_whitespace,
00664         exactly<'='>,
00665         optional_css_whitespace,
00666         ie_keyword_arg_value
00667       >(src);
00668     }
00669 
00670     // Path matching functions.
00671     /* not used anymore - remove?
00672     const char* folder(const char* src) {
00673       return sequence< zero_plus< any_char_except<'/'> >,
00674                        exactly<'/'> >(src);
00675     }
00676     const char* folders(const char* src) {
00677       return zero_plus< folder >(src);
00678     }*/
00679     /* not used anymore - remove?
00680     const char* chunk(const char* src) {
00681       char inside_str = 0;
00682       const char* p = src;
00683       size_t depth = 0;
00684       while (true) {
00685         if (!*p) {
00686           return 0;
00687         }
00688         else if (!inside_str && (*p == '"' || *p == '\'')) {
00689           inside_str = *p;
00690         }
00691         else if (*p == inside_str && *(p-1) != '\\') {
00692           inside_str = 0;
00693         }
00694         else if (*p == '(' && !inside_str) {
00695           ++depth;
00696         }
00697         else if (*p == ')' && !inside_str) {
00698           if (depth == 0) return p;
00699           else            --depth;
00700         }
00701         ++p;
00702       }
00703       // unreachable
00704       return 0;
00705     }
00706     */
00707 
00708     // follow the CSS spec more closely and see if this helps us scan URLs correctly
00709     /* not used anymore - remove?
00710     const char* NL(const char* src) {
00711       return alternatives< exactly<'\n'>,
00712                            sequence< exactly<'\r'>, exactly<'\n'> >,
00713                            exactly<'\r'>,
00714                            exactly<'\f'> >(src);
00715     }*/
00716 
00717     /* not used anymore - remove?
00718     const char* H(const char* src) {
00719       return std::isxdigit(*src) ? src+1 : 0;
00720     }*/
00721 
00722     /* not used anymore - remove?
00723     const char* unicode(const char* src) {
00724       return sequence< exactly<'\\'>,
00725                        between<H, 1, 6>,
00726                        optional< class_char<url_space_chars> > >(src);
00727     }*/
00728 
00729     /* not used anymore - remove?
00730     const char* ESCAPE(const char* src) {
00731       return alternatives< unicode, class_char<escape_chars> >(src);
00732     }*/
00733 
00734     const char* static_string(const char* src) {
00735       const char* pos = src;
00736       const char * s = quoted_string(pos);
00737       Token t(pos, s);
00738       const unsigned int p = count_interval< interpolant >(t.begin, t.end);
00739       return (p == 0) ? t.end : 0;
00740     }
00741 
00742     const char* static_component(const char* src) {
00743       return alternatives< identifier,
00744                            static_string,
00745                            percentage,
00746                            hex,
00747                            number,
00748                            sequence< exactly<'!'>, word<important_kwd> >
00749                           >(src);
00750     }
00751 
00752     const char* static_value(const char* src) {
00753       return sequence< sequence<
00754                          static_component,
00755                          zero_plus< identifier >
00756                        >,
00757                        zero_plus < sequence<
00758                                    alternatives<
00759                                      sequence< optional_spaces, alternatives<
00760                                        exactly < '/' >,
00761                                        exactly < ',' >,
00762                                        exactly < ' ' >
00763                                      >, optional_spaces >,
00764                                      spaces
00765                                    >,
00766                                    static_component
00767                        > >,
00768                        optional_css_whitespace,
00769                        alternatives< exactly<';'>, exactly<'}'> >
00770                       >(src);
00771     }
00772 
00773     const char* parenthese_scope(const char* src) {
00774       return sequence <
00775         exactly < '(' >,
00776         skip_over_scopes <
00777           exactly < '(' >,
00778           exactly < ')' >
00779         >
00780       >(src);
00781     }
00782 
00783   }
00784 }
